content:
rong of killing is primarily a wrong to the
individual who is killed; at the time of contraception there is no individual
to be wronged.
However, someone who presses the contraception objection might have
an answer to this reply. She might say that the sperm and egg are the indi-
viduals deprived of an FLO at the time of contraception. Thus, there are in-
dividuals  whom  contraception  deprives  of  an  FLO  and  if  depriving  an
individual  of  an  FLO  is  what  makes  killing  wrong,  then
